resources.string: Hello, my name is Nnadi Charles, and i\'m a mobile application developer. \n\nMy mission is to work in a top software company like Google, Amazon or Microsoft. I studied computer science and statistics in the University of Nigeria, Nsukka which is one of the best University in Nigeria as of the time of writing this article. I love playing football and also listening to music as well. This app My Bio, is my second mobile application which i learned using udemy teaching course. I believe in myself and hope for better tomorrow. I have a wonderful family who support me as well. Thank you so much for being here for me at this presence time.
